sql.t_moni_res_type.select: select c_id as modelId, c_tree_node_id as id, c_tree_node_id as pId, c_name as name, c_icon as icon from t_moni_res_type
sql.t_moni_model_base.select: select c_id as modelId, null as id, c_tree_node_id as pId, c_name as name, null as icon from t_moni_model_base where c_is_main = '1'
sql.t_moni_model_base.select_by_mainmodelid: select c_id as modelId, null as id, null as pId, c_name as name, null as icon from t_moni_model_base where c_main_model_id = ?
sql.t_moni_metric_base.select: SELECT metric.c_id AS metricId,metric.c_name AS metricName,metric.c_unit AS metricUnit,metric.c_data_type AS dataType,metric.c_metric_type AS metricType,metric.c_desc AS metricDesc,metric.c_is_custom AS isCustom,metric.c_user_id as metricUser,grouprel.c_metric_group_id AS groupRelId,grouprel.c_metric_id AS metricId,mgroup.c_name AS groupName,mgroup.c_id AS groupId FROM t_moni_metric_base AS metric,t_moni_metric_group_rel AS grouprel,t_moni_metric_group AS mgroup WHERE  metric.c_id = grouprel.c_metric_id AND mgroup.c_id = grouprel.c_metric_group_id ;
sql.t_moni_metric_group_rel.delete: DELETE FROM t_moni_metric_group_rel where c_metric_id in (:metric_ids)
sql.t_moni_metric_base.delete: DELETE FROM t_moni_metric_base WHERE c_id in (:ids)
sql.t_moni_metric_base.select_by_condation: SELECT metric.c_id AS metricName,metric.c_name AS metricType,metric.c_unit AS metricUnit,metric.c_data_type AS dataType,metric.c_desc AS metricDesc,metric.c_is_custom AS isCustom,metric.c_user_id as metricUser,grouprel.c_metric_group_id AS groupRelId,grouprel.c_metric_id AS metricId,mgroup.c_name AS groupName,mgroup.c_id AS groupId FROM t_moni_metric_base AS metric,t_moni_metric_group_rel AS grouprel,t_moni_metric_group AS mgroup WHERE  metric.c_id = grouprel.c_metric_id AND mgroup.c_id = grouprel.c_metric_group_id  and metric.c_name=? and metric.c_metric_type=? and metric.c_id=?
sql.t_moni_metric_group.select: SELECT c_id as groupId,c_name as groupName,c_desc as groupDesc FROM t_moni_metric_group
sql.t_moni_metric_group.delete: DELETE FROM t_moni_metric_group WHERE c_id in (:groupIds)
sql.t_moni_metric_group.selectById: SELECT c_id as groupId,c_name as groupName,c_desc as groupDesc FROM t_moni_metric_group WHERE c_id=?
